api.description: Django application - All backend symbols including models, views, serializers, URLs. Use apiLayers for targeted layer access.

shared.description: Shared utilities and helpers - Common functions, middleware, decorators, utilities used across apps.

models.description: Django models - ORM models, database table definitions, model managers, querysets

views.description: Views and viewsets - Django views, class-based views, DRF viewsets, API endpoints

serializers.description: DRF serializers - Django REST Framework serializers, validation, nested serializers

urls.description: URL configuration - URL patterns, routers, path definitions

services.description: Business logic services - Domain operations, orchestration, business rules (if using service layer pattern)

cores.description: Core infrastructure - Middleware, authentication, permissions, signals, management commands

metadata.description: Template for Django backend with Django REST Framework. Common patterns: Django ORM models, class-based views, DRF serializers, viewsets, routers. Adjust directories to match your project structure (apps/, src/, api/, etc.). Migrations are excluded by default.
